summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the making and repayment of a temporary loan of Two Thousand Five Hundred Fifty Dollars ($2,550.00) from the General Fund of the City of Seattle to "Local Improvement Fund District No. 3238", for the purpose of paying the cost and expense of the improvement of 42nd Avenue Southwest, et al, by grading, as provided in Ordinance No. 40092, of said city.
